articles.description: Taking to the stage at Estadio Atanasio Girardot, the pair sang Medellín - their collaboration from Madonna's 2019 LP Madame X - as well as her  2000 hit Music.
articles.content:
Madonna was still buzzing on Monday morning as she thanked fans for her rapturous welcome at Columbian singer Maluma's all-star homecoming show in Medellín. 
The pop legend, 63, was in the South Ame… [+3444 chars]

articles.author: Miles Surrey
articles.title: ‘Ozark’ Ends As an American Horror Story - The Ringer
articles.description: If there was any hope that the Byrdes would retain some semblance of humanity during the final batch of ‘Ozark’ episodes, the series’ bleak, brutal ending effectively squashes it
articles.content: For most of Breaking Bad, Walter White insisted that his ascension into a fearsome kingpin was the only way to make sure his family was provided for after a terminal cancer diagnosis. No matter what … [+8657 chars]

articles.author: By Janelle Davis, CNN
articles.title: 'Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy': What's on the menu in Venice - CNN
articles.description: In the premiere episode of season two of "Searching for Italy," Stanley Tucci traveled to Venice, a region known for its canals, gondolas and delicious regional specialties. Here's your guide to finding the dishes Tucci sampled.
